value.questionText: To ask the Minister for the Cabinet Office, what the cost to the public purse is of the UK Commission on Covid Commemoration.

To ask the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, what the cost to the public purse is of the covid-19 inquiry; if she will make an estimate of the anticipated total cost of the inquiry; and whether the inquiry is running to budget.
value.answeringBodyName: Department of Health and Social Care
